name: Lucky Dice - Get Rewards Easy
description:
NOW’S YOUR CHANCE TO BECOME A MILLIONAIRE IN LUCKY DICE!

America’s favorite board game meets the best casual game! Welcome to Lucky Dice! Where you’re guaranteed to feel like a mogul as you win your way to endless fun!
Lucky Dice is derived from a game that was created by Elizabeth Maggie, Monopoly, which is a classic board game for over 90 years. Lucky Dice is a classic dice/board game beloved by people of all ages. It’s a game of luck.

Download Lucky Dice today for Free!!

◆◆ Features of Lucky Dice◆◆


FREE coins for you every day.
Play with players around the world.
Play with Facebook Friends or as Guest
Earn free coins and tokens by rolling dices
Perfectly designed map, which is based on real-world sights, changes after each board

What are you waiting for? Have hours of fun playing Lucky Dice! Install now and travel around the world!

This game does not cost any real money.
Playing this game does not imply future success in “Real Money Gambling”.
Apple Inc. does not sponsor, nor in any way affiliated with Lucky Dice.
